content:
A look at planes, trains and automobiles around the world

EASTER WEEKEND is a busy travel time in many parts of the world. If you’re unlucky, you may have to pass through a terrible airport (we talk about the world’s worst). Or perhaps you’ll splash out and take one of the many sleeper train services that are cropping up (we discuss why train travel is such a draw, particularly for artists). And you might well get stuck in traffic (we visit the places where traffic jams are seen as opportunity rather than nuisance). Safe travels! Runtime: 22 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
[ 过去式 automobiled 过去分词 automobiled 现在分词 automobiling ]
n. 麻烦事；讨厌的人（或东西）；妨害行为
网络 损害；讨厌的东西；令人讨厌的东西
eg2: I don't want to be a nuisance so tell me if you want to be alone.
我不想讨人嫌，你要是想一个人待着就说一声。
I hope you're not making a nuisance of yourself .
我希望你没有讨人嫌。
It's a nuisance having to go back tomorrow.
明天不得不回去，真烦人。
What a nuisance!
真麻烦！
He was charged with causing a public nuisance.
他被控妨害公共利益罪。

ex: n. 轨枕；睡眠者；睡得…的人；睡觉者
网络 傻瓜大闹科学城；卧铺；沉睡者
eg2: a heavy/light/sound sleeper
睡得很沉╱轻╱香的人
Only the snores of the sleepers broke the silence of the house.
只有睡觉的人发出的鼾声打破了屋内的寂静。
the London–Edinburgh sleeper
伦敦到爱丁堡的卧铺列车

ex: vt. 溅，泼；用...使液体飞溅
n. 飞溅的水；污点；卖弄

wp.Splash Back: 飞溅泡泡;溅射回来;爆破黏液球;防溅板
wp.vertical splash: 垂直飞身压;铅直飞身压
wp.Acid Splash: 酸液飞溅;酸液溅射;酸性溅射;酸飞溅
wp.Splash screens: 启动画面;启动界面;排场画面;启动画面上
wp.Splash Shape: 散落型;在个人占星学中;在出生图中每一行星皆位在不同星座的型态

eg2: Don't splash my shoes.
别溅到我的鞋上。
Now copy the splash into the window we work in.
现在，将喷溅图片拖入我们工作的窗口。
This finding is similar to observations in Thailand, where a seawall at Patong Beach caused a -up of the tsunami wave and buildings behind it only suffered modest structural damages.
这个发现和在泰国观察到的是相似的，在那一个在巴东海滩的防波堤引起了一个海啸波的溅起，并且其后的建筑物只受到了适度的结构破坏。

ex: adj. 被…困住的；陷于…而动不了的；被…难住的；不知所措的
v. stick的过去式及过去分词
网络 被卡住的；车祸惊魂；粘住
eg2: The wheels were stuck in the mud.
车轮陷到了泥里。
This drawer keeps getting stuck .
这个抽屉动不动就卡住。
She got the key stuck in the lock.
她把钥匙卡在锁里了。
I can't get out─I'm stuck.
我出不去，我被卡住了。
We were stuck in traffic for over an hour.
我们堵车堵了一个多小时。
I hate being stuck at home all day.
我讨厌整天困在家里出不去。
I got stuck on the first question.
头一个问题我就答不上来。
I'll help you if you're stuck.
你要是难住了，我来帮你。
If you're stuck for something to do tonight, come out with us.
你要是正愁今晚没事做，就跟我们一块儿出去吧。
I've never known him to be stuck for words before.
我从不知道他也会有词穷句蹇的时候。
I was stuck with him for the whole journey.
一路上我一直没能摆脱他。

Title: An Easter-weekend travel special, on our daily podcast
